title: Week 15 Preview, Chargers-Chiefs Recap
itunes:title: Week 15 Preview, Chargers-Chiefs Recap
description:
In a room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Marc Sessler and Chris Wesseling – react to the magnificent conclusion of TNF (:20)! After, the heroes deduce every Week 15 affray, including – Cleveland attempting to kindle their playoff hopes against Denver (17:30), is Baltimore the front runner in the AFC North (26:00), what will it take from Green Bay to overcome the feisty Team of ATL (33:45), can Dallas secure the NFC East by corralling the Colts (40:40) and will the TITOONS emulate last Thursday’s performance versus the GGGMMMENNN (55:30)?! The heroes then debate who will prevail in Pittsburgh (1:04:30), can Nick Foles channel his Super Bowl MVP essence in Los Angeles (1:12:10) and lastly, is Ron Rivera’s time in Carolina done (1:17:00)?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
